name: Andrélon Shampoo care en repair
composition: INGREDIËNTEN: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Lysine HCl, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil (Amandelolie), Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil (Zonnebloemolie), Hydrolyzed Keratin (Keratine), Dimethiconol, Sodium Benzoate, Glycol Distearate, Citric Acid, Carbomer, Gluconolactone, Sodium Sulfate, Trehalose, Parfum, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, TEA-Sulfate, Cocamide MEA, Paraffinum Liquidum, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Disodium EDTA, PEG-45M, Phenoxyethanol, Glycerin, PPG-6, Sodium Hydroxide, Geraniol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, CI 77891.
